direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding mappings to the map, but putAll adds multiple mappings at once.
Both methods modify the map, but remove removes a mapping instead of adding one.
addComposited adds a new map to the composite, which can affect the behavior of put.
removeComposited removes a map from the composite, which can affect the behavior of put.
Both methods modify the map, but clear removes all mappings instead of adding one.
